content: X-Change core bit barrel X-Change barrel for coring in concrete and masonry ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond core bits, X-Change modules, and segments ### FEATURES:Features Unique Hilti X-Change module system (2- 10 diameter) enables easy core removal, fast stuck core bit recovery and on-site retipping using just a flat-tip screwdriver Free a stuck core bit in less time and with less damage than when removing conventional core bits (X-Change module) Easily slide a stuck core out of the barrel by detaching the module (X-Change module) Save significant space and weight by replacing conventional core bits with a single barrel and multiple modules (X-Change module Applications Wet or dry diamond coring Hand-held or rig-mounted ### TECHNICAL DATA: Technical Data | Connection end | No connection end ### ITEMS- 2196519 -
